Theme.name: com.filemaker.theme.enlightened

PrivilegeSet.name: [Data Entry Only]
PrivilegeSet.Description: write access to all records, no design access

PrivilegeSet.name: [Read-Only Access]
PrivilegeSet.Description: read access to all records, no design access, write access to all global fields

ExtendedPrivilege.name: fmreauthenticate10
ExtendedPrivilege.Description: Require re-authentication after the specified minutes in sleep/background.

ExtendedPrivilege.name: fmxml
ExtendedPrivilege.Description: Access via XML Web Publishing - FMS only

ExtendedPrivilege.name: fmphp
ExtendedPrivilege.Description: Access via PHP Web Publishing - FMS only

ExtendedPrivilege.name: fmextscriptaccess
ExtendedPrivilege.Description: Allow Apple events and ActiveX to perform FileMaker operations

ExtendedPrivilege.name: fmurlscript
ExtendedPrivilege.Description: Allow URLs to perform FileMaker scripts

Comment.value: Purpose: Uses the token passed as a parameter in the URL to offer the user the chance to change their password Parameters: _token: A UUID token that identifies which user needs the password reset Version: 20-02-25 - Charles Ross

window.Offscreen
